Typealiases.html#/s:7Tweener11ToTypeBloc.name: ToTypeBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:7Tweener11ToTypeBloc.abstract: Blocks to cast Custom data types into Arrays and back to Type.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener7addType02toC0.abstract: Method to add support to custom Types.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener12removeTweens.name: removeTweens(target:keys:)
Functions.html#/s:7Tweener12removeTweens.abstract: Remove tweens by a specific target a specific KeyPaths, this method keeps existing tweens not declared in KeyPath list.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener11pauseTweens6.name: pauseTweens(target:keys:)
Functions.html#/s:7Tweener11pauseTweens6.abstract: Pause tweens by a specific target a specific KeyPaths, this method ignores existing tweens not declared in KeyPath list.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener12resumeTweens.name: resumeTweens(target:keys:)
Functions.html#/s:7Tweener12resumeTweens.abstract: Resume tweens by a specific target a specific KeyPaths, this method ignores existing tweens not declared in KeyPath list.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener9resumeAllyyF.name: resumeAll()
Functions.html#/s:7Tweener9resumeAllyyF.abstract: Resume all existing Tweens and Timelines in Engine.

Functions.html#/s:7Tweener9removeAllyyF.name: removeAll()
Functions.html#/s:7Tweener9removeAllyyF.abstract: Remove all existing Tweens and Timelines in Engine.

Extensions/NSView.html#/zoom(scale:durat.abstract: Zoom, animates CATransform3D x and y scale to normal position with an Ease.outCirc animation curve.

Extensions/NSView.html#/zoomIn(duration:.abstract: Zoom In, animates CATransform3D x and y scale from 0.1 to normal position.

Extensions/NSView.html#/zoomOut(duration.abstract: Zoom Out, animates CATransform3D x and y scale from 2.0 to normal position.

Extensions/NSView.html#/pop(scale:).name: pop(scale:)
Extensions/NSView.html#/pop(scale:).abstract: Pop, animates CATransform3D x and y scale and returns to normal transformation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/basicIn(distance.abstract: Basic In, animates CATransform3D x and y“from” desired translation “to” normal translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/basicOut(distanc.name: basicOut(distanceX:distanceY:duration:ease:)
Extensions/NSView.html#/basicOut(distanc.abstract: Basic Out, animates CATransform3D x and y“from” normal translation “to” desired translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/fly(distanceX:di.abstract: Fly, animates to normal translation calling basicIn() with Ease.outBack as animation curve.

Extensions/NSView.html#/flyLeft(distance.name: flyLeft(distance:duration:)

Extensions/NSView.html#/flyRight(distanc.name: flyRight(distance:duration:)
Extensions/NSView.html#/flyRight(distanc.abstract: Fly right, animates from right to normal translation calling fly() over horizontal axis from a negative intial translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/flyBottom(distan.abstract: Fly bottom, animates from bottom to normal translation calling fly() over vertical axis from a positive intial translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/slide(distanceX:.abstract: Slide, animates to normal translation calling basicIn() with Ease.outCubic as animation curve.

Extensions/NSView.html#/slideLeft(distan.name: slideLeft(distance:duration:)
Extensions/NSView.html#/slideLeft(distan.abstract: Slide left, animates from left to normal translation calling slide() over horizontal axis from a positive intial translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/slideTop(distanc.abstract: Slide top, animates from top to normal translation calling slide() over vertical axis from a negative intial translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/slideBottom(dist.abstract: Slide bottom, animates from bottom to normal translation calling slide() over vertical axis from a positive intial translation.

Extensions/NSView.html#/swing(angle:dura.abstract: Swing, animates CATransform3D z axis rotation from a desired angle back to normal rotation ‘swinging".

Extensions/NSView.html#/flip(xAxis:yAxis.abstract: Flip, animates CATransform3D x and/or y axis rotation performing a 3D flip effect with perspective.

Extensions/NSView.html#/flipX(inverted:).abstract: Flip X, animates CATransform3D x axis rotation performing a 3D flip effect with perspective.

Extensions/NSView.html#/spin(leaps:durat.abstract: Spin, animates CATransform3D x and/or y axis rotation performing a 3D flip effect with perspective.

Extensions/NSView.html#/shake(distance:s.abstract: Shake, creates an animated shake effect with layer’s CATransform3D translating over x coordinate.

Extensions/NSView.html#/jiggle(transform.abstract: Jiggle, creates an elastic transfrom effect by scaling layer’s CATransform3D.

Extensions/NSView.html#/bounce(distance:.abstract: Bounce, creates an bouncing transfrom effect by translating layer’s CATransform3D.

Extensions/NSView.html#/loop(speed:clock.abstract: Bounce, creates an bouncing transfrom effect by translating layer’s CATransform3D.

Classes/Ease.html.name: Ease

Classes/PDFImageView.html.name: PDFImageView

Classes/Timeline.html.name: Timeline
Classes/Timeline.html.abstract: A class that contains and controls a collection of Tweens.

Classes/AnyTween.html.name: AnyTween
Classes/AnyTween.html.abstract: A Tween wrapper to handle any tween, don’t use this class it’s for utility purposes, use Tween instead.

Classes/Tween.html.name: Tween
Classes/Tween.html.abstract: Tween related to a specific target instance class or struct Type:T.

Classes/TweenBlock.html.name: TweenBlock
Classes/TweenBlock.html.abstract: A generic Type Class with an animatable value and a block to handle each update with it’s updated value called on value’s ‘didSet’ event.
